title: Vegan

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inform someone that you are a Vegan each night.
- Choose someone who you have informed that you are a Vegan at night. You will give them a lecture on veganism roleblocking them through immunity. If you target someone that you have not informed, your ability will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who visit you will automatically be informed that you are a Vegan. You will be told how many people you inform each night, but not who you inform.
- Players who you have informed will receive your name and your role.
- You may not multitask.

desc:
Post 327
*Well, let's just hope you're not a teacher.*
